description:
Regarded as one of the greatest
action games of all time, Mega Man 2
improves upon its already superb
predecessor. With even more stages
and Robot Masters, its sheer size and
scope are enough to get gamers'
hearts palpitating.

The year is 200X. Dr. Light’s
super-robot, Mega Man, has
succeeded in defeating the nefarious
Dr. Wily and peace reigns over the
planet. However, Dr. Wily returns with
a new army of Robot Masters to
challenge our hero. Can Mega Man
save the world again?
name: MEGA MAN™ 2
